price: 27. Markaasuu Alle nagu manneystay (denbi dhaaf) oo naga dhowray cadaabka hanfiga kulul.
arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: famanna al-lahu ʿalaynā wawaqānā ʿadhāba al-samūmi
